    public class UNumberWithSqrt
extends UNumber

    Title: UNumberWithSqrt Class, a component of the Unlimited Precision Math Package.

    Description: A demonstration package to show the notion of a package and to exercise array usage

    Copyright: Lynn Robert Carter Â© 2014

    Version:
    1.03 Addition of code to support the Square root function for the UNumber., 1.02a Addition of code to support quality improvements, and the removal of the div2 method, 1.01 The initial version plus an improved add/sub, normalize, div, div2, lessThan, greaterThan, abs, and compareTo, 8.00 2019-10-23 Jatin Thakur work on the UI of the Calculator and the UNumber in this previous version . Add the code for using the UNumber code in calculator.
    Author:
    Jatin Thakur
